holidays.title: National Lose the Jet Lag Day
holidays.description: Shining a light on jet lag science and helping travelers adjust rapidly to new time zones!

holidays.title: Benjamin Franklin Day
holidays.description: Benjamin Franklin is more than just the face on your money — here’s why we pay homage.

holidays.title: Cable Car Day
holidays.description: Cable cars are one of the greenest modes of transport. Read on to find out why!

holidays.title: Customer Service Day
holidays.description: Good customer service can be an asset to a brand. Read on to find out why!

holidays.title: Day of Judgment
holidays.description: Go on, be your own judge and make up the rules this Day of Judgment!

holidays.title: Ditch New Year's Resolution Day
holidays.description: Grab some ice cream, skip that workout, and spend more time on your phone!

holidays.title: International We Are Not Broken Day
holidays.description: Let’s pause for a while and think of someone traumatized or injured physically and emotionally.

holidays.title: James Leonard Tagle Gordon Day
holidays.description: Hats off, it’s James Leonard Tagle Gordon Day! Let’s learn more about the late hero.

holidays.title: Kid Inventors’ Day
holidays.description: Kid geniuses are all around us. Take a day to celebrate and learn more!

holidays.title: National Bootlegger’s Day
holidays.description: Raise your glass as we celebrate those who took risks to keep the good times rolling.

holidays.title: National Carolina Day
holidays.description: National Carolina Day is here! Let us come together to celebrate this beautiful name!

holidays.title: National Charlotte Day
holidays.description: Let us learn about the Charlottes who have left their mark on the world.

holidays.title: National Hot Buttered Rum Day
holidays.description: Enjoyed best in the fall and winter, Hot Buttered Rum is “comfort food in a mug.”

holidays.title: National Hot Heads Chili Day
holidays.description: Make your meals extra hot today and celebrate National Hot Heads Chili Day with us!

holidays.title: National Ta Day
holidays.description: It is time for people to come together and celebrate this day to appreciate and recognize all Ta’s in the world.

holidays.title: Popeye Day
holidays.description: Let us take a stroll through one of the most popular comic cartoons of all time.

holidays.title: Michelle Obama’s Birthday
holidays.description: As first lady, Michelle Obama won our hearts with inspiring speeches and acts of kindness.

holidays.title: Betty White’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Hollywood icon has left her successors with big shoes to fill.

holidays.title: Dwyane Wade’s Birthday
holidays.description: This retired ballplayer has nothing left to prove. He’s won it all.

holidays.title: Eartha Kitt’s Birthday
holidays.description: This bundle of talent blazed the trail for countless black singers and actresses.

holidays.title: FKA Twigs’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented FKA Twigs will make a fan out of anyone who experiences her work.

holidays.title: Jake Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this versatile personality and mogul, many new opportunities still await him.

holidays.title: James Earl Jones’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his deep voice and infectious laugh, we cannot get enough of Jones.

holidays.title: Jim Carrey’s Birthday
holidays.description: There may not be more feats left to conquer for this comedic Golden Globe Award-winning actor.

holidays.title: Kid Rock’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kid Rock is not afraid of going the extra mile to be the best at everything!

holidays.title: Maury Povich’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s honor the brash king of tabloid T.V. we’ll surely miss watching on our screens.

holidays.title: Muhammad Ali’s Birthday
holidays.description: Muhammad Ali is the man, the myth, and the legend who lives on in our hearts.

holidays.title: Ray J’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s an artist and T.V. personality who had dreams and worked hard to achieve them.

holidays.title: Sara Molina’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite the controversies, she has managed to stay resilient and make a name for herself.

holidays.title: Skate Maloley’s Birthday
holidays.description: Quitting college after a year to pursue music is a typical Skate Maloley move!

holidays.title: Steve Harvey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented entertainment star has certainly made his mark in the industry.

holidays.title: Zooey Deschanel’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning actor and singer has risen to become a juggernaut in Hollywood.
